stanza.line: Sweet love renew thy force be it not (a)said(/a)
Thy edge should blunter be than (b)appetite(/b)
Which but to-day by feeding is (a)allayed(/a)
So love be thou although to-day thou (c)fill(/c)
Thy hungry eyes even till they wink with (d)fulness(/d)
To-morrow see again and do not (c)kill(/c)
The spirit of love with a perpetual (d)dulness(/d)
Let this sad interim like the ocean (e)be(/e)
Which parts the shore where two contracted (f)new(/f)
Come daily to the banks that when they (e)see(/e)
Return of love more blest may be the (f)view(/f)
Or call it winter which being full of (g)care(/g)
Makes summer's welcome thrice more wished more (g)rare(/g)
